page.title: 08OTHER SERVICES
page.content: MANY OTHER SERVICES ARE NOT AVAILABLE TO THE PEOPLE OF THE GRID AREA AND THEY HAVE TO RELY ON TRAVELLING SHOPS INCLUDING THOSE SUPPLYING FRUIT AND MEAT. THE COUNTY LIBRARY SERVICES SITUATED IN RETFORD ARE AVAILABLE TO THE RESIDENTS THROUGH THE GRID AREA. FOR THOSE WHO ARE UNABLE TO JOURNEY TO THE MAIN LIBRARY,A TRAVELLING SERVICE VIA A MOBILE LIBRARY VAN IS AVAILABLE ON DAY PER FORTNIGHT. OTHER SERVICES ARE ALSO ONLY AVAILABLE IN THE LARGER CENTRES OF POPULATION. FOR THOSE INTERESTED IN THEATRE THE NEAREST LIVE THEATRE IS THE RETFORD LITTLE THEATRE AN AMATEUR GROUP OF LONG STANDING (1941)SITUATED IN NEW PREMISES IN THAT TOWN.THERE IS NO CINEMA IN EITHER OF THE TWO VILLAGES AND FOLLOWING THE CLOSURE OF THE CINEMA IN RETFORD A JOURNEY TO WORKSOP
